flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=103>>103 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 103 + 35 = <<103+35=138>>138 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 138 - 15 = 123 books
#### 123

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 103. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
